thread.title: Enjoyable visit, great hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Enjoyable visit, great hotel, great location - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: David_G_B69
title: Enjoyable visit, great hotel, great location
text:
We stopped at this hotel whilst the Move It exhibition was on at the Excel.
The rooms were very comfortable, the staff very friendly and professional.
The location for he Excel is fantastic. Super close.
There are no down sides for me except the restaurant can be a little pricey compared to the Premier Inn next door. In our case we ate at the Premier Inn but much preferred our rooms at the doubletree.
Keep up the good work and we hope to be back next year.
